pr_title: Issue #7740: Update AbstractChecks to log DetailAST - JavadocStyle

timeline.message: Issue #7740: Update AbstractChecks to log DetailAST - JavadocStyle
Issue #7740: Update AbstractChecks to log DetailAST - JavadocStyle

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/src/test/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/internal/XpathRegressionTest.java b/src/test/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/internal/XpathRegressionTest.java
index 49945434d..b10f7d21a 100644
--- a/src/test/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/internal/XpathRegressionTest.java
+++ b/src/test/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/internal/XpathRegressionTest.java

@@ -103,12 +102,20 @@ public class XpathRegressionTest extends AbstractModuleTestSupport {
                     "AtclauseOrder",
                     "JavadocBlockTagLocation",
                     "JavadocParagraph",
+                    "JavadocStyle",
                     "JavadocTagContinuationIndentation",
                     "MissingDeprecated",
                     "NonEmptyAtclauseDescription",
                     "SingleLineJavadoc",
-                    "SummaryJavadoc",
-                    "JavadocStyle"
+                    "SummaryJavadoc"
+    )));
+
+    // Older regex-based checks that are under INCOMPATIBLE_JAVADOC_CHECK_NAMES
+    // but not subclasses of AbstractJavadocCheck.
+    // Will eventually include JavadocMethodCheck and JavadocTypeCheck.
+    private static final Set<Class<?>> ADDITIONAL_JAVADOC_CHECKS =
+            Collections.unmodifiableSet(new HashSet<>(Arrays.asList(
+                    JavadocStyleCheck.class
     )));
 
     // Checks that allowed to have no XPath IT Regression Testing

timeline.author: rnveach
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -162,7 +159,7 @@ * * *

- * Also, the filter does not support Javadoc checks: + * Also, the filter does not support suppression inside javadoc reported by Javadoc checks:

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/src/main/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/filters/SuppressionXpathFilter.java b/src/main/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/filters/SuppressionXpathFilter.java index 44f350168..a0feaf047 100644 --- a/src/main/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/filters/SuppressionXpathFilter.java +++ b/src/main/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/filters/SuppressionXpathFilter.java @@ -159,7 +159,7 @@ import com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.utils.FilterUtil; * * *

- * Also, the filter does not support suppression inside javadoc reported by Javadoc checks: + * Also, the filter does not support suppressions inside javadoc reported by Javadoc checks: *

*
    *

timeline.bodyText: It is possible we will have other checks join this list. Please move it to a field.
timeline.author: rnveach

replies.bodyText: Ok, I'll move it out as a constant next to the definition of INCOMPATIBLE_JAVADOC_CHECK_NAMES
replies.author: wltan

timeline.bodyText: Do we need 2 streams? Does it make sense to combine them and the assignment of the Set?
timeline.author: rnveach

replies.bodyText: Since the latter stream is being moved to a field, I'll just revert the former stream to Set and work on that as it's closer to the original behavior anyway.
replies.author: wltan
